vernac_cmds: Definition xi : R -> R := x intr.
Definition yi : R -> R := y intr.
Definition xP (t : R) : R := (xi t - xi 0)%R.
Definition yP (t : R) : R := (yi t - yi 0)%R.
Definition u (eps : posreal) (t : R) : R := sqrt (Rsqr (xP t) + Rsqr (yP t) + Rsqr eps).
Definition u0 (t : R) : R := sqrt (Rsqr (xP t) + Rsqr (yP t)).
Lemma d_u : forall eps : posreal, derivable (fun t : R => u eps t).
unfold u in |- *; unfold derivable in |- *; intro.
apply Rle_lt_trans with (Rsqr (xP x) + Rsqr (yP x))%R.
pattern (Rsqr (yP x)) at 1 in |- *; rewrite <- Rplus_0_r.
red in |- *; intro; assert (H0 := cond_pos eps); rewrite H in H0; elim (Rlt_irrefl _ H0).
Lemma fct_der2 : forall (eps : posreal) (t : R), derivable_pt (fun y : R => Rsqr (u eps y)) t.
Lemma D_Rsqr_u_epsilon_1 : forall (eps : posreal) (t : R), derive_pt (fun y : R => Rsqr (u eps y)) t (fct_der2 eps t) = (2 * u eps t * derive_pt (u eps) t (d_u eps t))%R.
cut (derivable_pt f t); [ intro H | apply (d_u eps t) ].
cut (derive_pt f t H = derive_pt f t (d_u eps t)); [ intro | apply pr_nu ].
Lemma xP_derive : forall t : R, derive_pt xP t (xP_derivable t) = derive_pt xi t (xi_derivable t).
Lemma yP_derive : forall t : R, derive_pt yP t (yP_derivable t) = derive_pt yi t (yi_derivable t).
Lemma fct_der3 : forall (eps : posreal) (t : R), derivable_pt (fun y : R => (Rsqr (xP y) + (Rsqr (yP y) + Rsqr eps))%R) t.
Lemma D_Rsqr_u_epsilon_2 : forall (eps : posreal) (t : R), (derive_pt (fun y : R => Rsqr (u eps y)) t (fct_der2 eps t) <= 2 * u0 t * vi)%R.
replace (derive_pt (fun y : R => Rsqr (f y)) t (fct_der2 eps t)) with (derive_pt (fun y : R => (Rsqr (xP y) + (Rsqr (yP y) + Rsqr eps))%R) t (fct_der3 eps t)).
replace (derive_pt (fun y : R => (Rsqr (xP y) + (Rsqr (yP y) + Rsqr eps))%R) t (fct_der3 eps t)) with (2 * derive_pt xP t (xP_derivable t) * xP t + 2 * derive_pt yP t (yP_derivable t) * yP t)%R.
cut (derive_pt (x intr) t (cond_diff (x intr) t) = derive_pt xi t (xi_derivable t)); [ intro | apply pr_nu ].
cut (derive_pt (y intr) t (cond_diff (y intr) t) = derive_pt yi t (yi_derivable t)); [ intro | apply pr_nu ].
rewrite <- H; rewrite <- H2; rewrite H1; rewrite H0.

generalize (sqrt_cauchy (cos (theta intr t)) (sin (theta intr t)) (xP t) (yP t)); rewrite (Rplus_comm (Rsqr (cos (theta intr t)))); rewrite sin2_cos2; rewrite sqrt_1; rewrite Rmult_1_l; intro H8; unfold u0 in |- *; assumption.

unfold derive_pt in |- *; unfold derivable_pt_abs in |- *; cut (forall l : R, derivable_pt_lim (fun y : R => (Rsqr (xP y) + (Rsqr (yP y) + Rsqr eps))%R) t l <-> derivable_pt_lim (fun y : R => Rsqr (f y)) t l).
elim H0; intros; fold f in d0.
exists x; intros; unfold f in |- *; unfold u in |- *.
repeat apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat; try apply Rle_0_sqr.
repeat apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat; try apply Rle_0_sqr.
exists x; intros; unfold f in H1; unfold u in H1.

replace ((Rsqr (xP (t + h)) + (Rsqr (yP (t + h)) + Rsqr eps) - (Rsqr (xP t) + (Rsqr (yP t) + Rsqr eps))) / h - l)%R with ((Rsqr (sqrt (Rsqr (xP (t + h)) + Rsqr (yP (t + h)) + Rsqr eps)) - Rsqr (sqrt (Rsqr (xP t) + Rsqr (yP t) + Rsqr eps))) / h - l)%R.
repeat apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat; try apply Rle_0_sqr.
repeat apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat; try apply Rle_0_sqr.
Lemma u_stric_pos : forall (eps : posreal) (t : R), (0 < u eps t)%R.

intros; unfold u in |- *; apply sqrt_lt_R0; apply Rplus_le_lt_0_compat; [ apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat; apply Rle_0_sqr | apply Rsqr_pos_lt; red in |- *; intro H; generalize (cond_pos eps); intro H0; rewrite H in H0; elim (Rlt_irrefl 0 H0) ].
Lemma u_pos : forall (eps : posreal) (t : R), (0 <= u eps t)%R.
Lemma u0_pos : forall t : R, (0 <= u0 t)%R.
intros; unfold u0 in |- *; apply sqrt_positivity; apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat; apply Rle_0_sqr.
Lemma Rsqr_u_epsilon : forall (eps : posreal) (t : R), Rsqr (u eps t) = (Rsqr (u0 t) + Rsqr eps)%R.

intros; apply sqrt_inj; [ apply Rle_0_sqr | apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat; apply Rle_0_sqr | rewrite sqrt_Rsqr; [ unfold u0 in |- *; rewrite Rsqr_sqrt; [ unfold u in |- *; reflexivity | apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat; apply Rle_0_sqr ] | apply (u_pos eps t) ] ].
Lemma u0_u_epsilon : forall (eps : posreal) (t : R), (u0 t <= u eps t)%R.

intros; apply Rsqr_incr_0; [ unfold u0, u in |- *; repeat rewrite Rsqr_sqrt; [ rewrite <- (Rplus_0_r (Rsqr (xP t) + Rsqr (yP t))); repeat rewrite Rplus_assoc; repeat apply Rplus_le_compat_l; rewrite Rplus_0_l; apply Rle_0_sqr | repeat apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat; apply Rle_0_sqr | apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat; apply Rle_0_sqr ] | apply u0_pos | apply u_pos ].
Lemma u_epsilon_le_v : forall (eps : posreal) (t : R), (derive_pt (u eps) t (d_u eps t) <= vi)%R.
generalize (Rmult_le_reg_l 2 (u eps t * derive_pt (u eps) t (d_u eps t)) (u0 t * vi) Hyp H); intro H1.
generalize (u0_u_epsilon eps t); intro H2; generalize (Rmult_le_compat_r (v vi) (u0 t) (u eps t) (Rlt_le 0 vi (TypeSpeed_pos vi)) H2); intro H3.
generalize (Rle_trans (u eps t * derive_pt (u eps) t (d_u eps t)) (u0 t * vi) (u eps t * vi) H1 H3); intro H4.
apply (Rmult_le_reg_l (u eps t) (derive_pt (u eps) t (d_u eps t)) vi (u_stric_pos eps t) H4).
Lemma vit_derivable : derivable (fun t : R => (vi * t)%R).
Lemma derive_vit : forall t : R, derive_pt (fun t : R => (vi * t)%R) t (vit_derivable t) = vi.
Lemma u_epsilon_le_vt : forall (eps : posreal) (t : R), (0 <= t)%R -> (u eps t - eps <= vi * t)%R.
generalize (IAF_var (fun t : R => (vi * t)%R) (fun t : R => u eps t) 0 t vit_derivable (d_u eps) H); intros.
rewrite Rmult_0_r in H2; unfold Rminus in H2; rewrite Ropp_0 in H2; rewrite Rplus_0_r in H2; left; assumption.
rewrite Rmult_0_r in H2; unfold Rminus in H2; rewrite Ropp_0 in H2; rewrite Rplus_0_r in H2; right; assumption.

unfold u in |- *; unfold xP in |- *; unfold yP in |- *; unfold Rminus in |- *; repeat rewrite Rplus_opp_r; rewrite Rsqr_0; repeat rewrite Rplus_0_l; apply (sqrt_Rsqr eps (Rlt_le 0 eps (cond_pos eps))).
Lemma Rsqr_u : forall (eps : posreal) (t : R), (0 <= t)%R -> (Rsqr (u0 t) <= Rsqr vi * Rsqr t + 2 * eps * vi * t)%R.
intros; cut (u eps t <= vi * t + eps)%R.

intro H0; generalize (u_pos eps t); intro H1; generalize (Rsqr_incr_1 (u eps t) (vi * t + eps) H0 H1 (Rle_trans 0 (u eps t) (vi * t + eps) H1 H0)); intro H2; rewrite Rsqr_plus in H2; rewrite Rsqr_u_epsilon in H2; rewrite Rsqr_mult in H2; rewrite <- (Rplus_comm (2 * (vi * t) * eps)) in H2; generalize (Rplus_le_compat_r (- Rsqr eps) (Rsqr (u0 t) + Rsqr eps) (2 * (vi * t) * eps + (Rsqr vi * Rsqr t + Rsqr eps)) H2); unfold Rminus in |- *; repeat rewrite Rplus_assoc; repeat rewrite Rplus_opp_r; repeat rewrite Rplus_0_r; intro H3; replace (Rsqr vi * Rsqr t + 2 * eps * vi * t)%R with (2 * (vi * t) * eps + Rsqr vi * Rsqr t)%R.
apply Rplus_le_reg_l with (- eps)%R; rewrite Rplus_comm; replace (- eps + (vi * t + eps))%R with (vi * t)%R.
generalize (u_epsilon_le_vt eps t H); unfold Rminus in |- *; intro; assumption.
Lemma Rsqr_u_Rsqr_vt : forall (eps : posreal) (t : R), (0 <= t)%R -> (Rsqr (u0 t) <= Rsqr vi * Rsqr t + eps)%R.
intro; generalize (Rsqr_u (mkposreal (eps / (2 * vi * t)) H1) t H); simpl in |- *; replace (2 * (eps / (2 * vi * t)) * vi * t)%R with (eps * 1)%R.
unfold Rdiv in |- *; repeat rewrite Rinv_mult_distr.
replace (2 * (eps * (/ 2 * / vi * / t)) * vi * t)%R with (eps * (2 * / 2) * (/ vi * vi) * (/ t * t))%R.
red in |- *; intro H2; rewrite H2 in H0; elim (Rlt_irrefl 0 H0).
generalize (TypeSpeed_pos vi); intro H2; red in |- *; intro H3; rewrite H3 in H2; elim (Rlt_irrefl 0 H2).
generalize (TypeSpeed_pos vi); intro H2; red in |- *; intro H3; rewrite H3 in H2; elim (Rlt_irrefl 0 H2).
generalize (TypeSpeed_pos vi); intro H2; red in |- *; intro H3; rewrite H3 in H2; elim (Rlt_irrefl 0 H2).
red in |- *; intro H2; rewrite H2 in H0; elim (Rlt_irrefl 0 H0).

rewrite <- H1; unfold u0 in |- *; unfold xP, yP in |- *; unfold Rminus in |- *; repeat rewrite Rplus_opp_r; repeat rewrite Rsqr_0; rewrite Rmult_0_r; repeat rewrite Rplus_0_l; rewrite sqrt_0; rewrite Rsqr_0; left; apply (cond_pos eps).
Theorem YCNGFTYS : forall t : R, (0 <= t)%R -> (sqrt (Rsqr (xi t - xi 0) + Rsqr (yi t - yi 0)) <= v vi * t)%R.
rewrite Rsqr_mult; apply le_epsilon; intros; generalize (Rsqr_u_Rsqr_vt (mkposreal eps H0) t H); simpl in |- *; unfold u0 in |- *; unfold xP, yP in |- *; intro H1; assumption.
apply sqrt_positivity; apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat; apply Rle_0_sqr.
apply Rmult_le_pos; [ left; apply (TypeSpeed_pos vi) | assumption ].

command: unfold u in |- *; unfold derivable in |- *; intro.
apply Rle_lt_trans with (Rsqr (xP x) + Rsqr (yP x))%R.
pattern (Rsqr (yP x)) at 1 in |- *; rewrite <- Rplus_0_r.
red in |- *; intro; assert (H0 := cond_pos eps); rewrite H in H0; elim (Rlt_irrefl _ H0).
cut (derivable_pt f t); [ intro H | apply (d_u eps t) ].
cut (derive_pt f t H = derive_pt f t (d_u eps t)); [ intro | apply pr_nu ].

intros; unfold u in |- *; apply sqrt_lt_R0; apply Rplus_le_lt_0_compat; [ apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat; apply Rle_0_sqr | apply Rsqr_pos_lt; red in |- *; intro H; generalize (cond_pos eps); intro H0; rewrite H in H0; elim (Rlt_irrefl 0 H0) ].
intros; unfold u0 in |- *; apply sqrt_positivity; apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat; apply Rle_0_sqr.

intros; apply sqrt_inj; [ apply Rle_0_sqr | apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat; apply Rle_0_sqr | rewrite sqrt_Rsqr; [ unfold u0 in |- *; rewrite Rsqr_sqrt; [ unfold u in |- *; reflexivity | apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat; apply Rle_0_sqr ] | apply (u_pos eps t) ] ].

intros; apply Rsqr_incr_0; [ unfold u0, u in |- *; repeat rewrite Rsqr_sqrt; [ rewrite <- (Rplus_0_r (Rsqr (xP t) + Rsqr (yP t))); repeat rewrite Rplus_assoc; repeat apply Rplus_le_compat_l; rewrite Rplus_0_l; apply Rle_0_sqr | repeat apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat; apply Rle_0_sqr | apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat; apply Rle_0_sqr ] | apply u0_pos | apply u_pos ].
generalize (Rmult_le_reg_l 2 (u eps t * derive_pt (u eps) t (d_u eps t)) (u0 t * vi) Hyp H); intro H1.
generalize (u0_u_epsilon eps t); intro H2; generalize (Rmult_le_compat_r (v vi) (u0 t) (u eps t) (Rlt_le 0 vi (TypeSpeed_pos vi)) H2); intro H3.
generalize (Rle_trans (u eps t * derive_pt (u eps) t (d_u eps t)) (u0 t * vi) (u eps t * vi) H1 H3); intro H4.
apply (Rmult_le_reg_l (u eps t) (derive_pt (u eps) t (d_u eps t)) vi (u_stric_pos eps t) H4).
generalize (IAF_var (fun t : R => (vi * t)%R) (fun t : R => u eps t) 0 t vit_derivable (d_u eps) H); intros.
rewrite Rmult_0_r in H2; unfold Rminus in H2; rewrite Ropp_0 in H2; rewrite Rplus_0_r in H2; left; assumption.
rewrite Rmult_0_r in H2; unfold Rminus in H2; rewrite Ropp_0 in H2; rewrite Rplus_0_r in H2; right; assumption.

unfold u in |- *; unfold xP in |- *; unfold yP in |- *; unfold Rminus in |- *; repeat rewrite Rplus_opp_r; rewrite Rsqr_0; repeat rewrite Rplus_0_l; apply (sqrt_Rsqr eps (Rlt_le 0 eps (cond_pos eps))).
intros; cut (u eps t <= vi * t + eps)%R.

intro H0; generalize (u_pos eps t); intro H1; generalize (Rsqr_incr_1 (u eps t) (vi * t + eps) H0 H1 (Rle_trans 0 (u eps t) (vi * t + eps) H1 H0)); intro H2; rewrite Rsqr_plus in H2; rewrite Rsqr_u_epsilon in H2; rewrite Rsqr_mult in H2; rewrite <- (Rplus_comm (2 * (vi * t) * eps)) in H2; generalize (Rplus_le_compat_r (- Rsqr eps) (Rsqr (u0 t) + Rsqr eps) (2 * (vi * t) * eps + (Rsqr vi * Rsqr t + Rsqr eps)) H2); unfold Rminus in |- *; repeat rewrite Rplus_assoc; repeat rewrite Rplus_opp_r; repeat rewrite Rplus_0_r; intro H3; replace (Rsqr vi * Rsqr t + 2 * eps * vi * t)%R with (2 * (vi * t) * eps + Rsqr vi * Rsqr t)%R.
apply Rplus_le_reg_l with (- eps)%R; rewrite Rplus_comm; replace (- eps + (vi * t + eps))%R with (vi * t)%R.
generalize (u_epsilon_le_vt eps t H); unfold Rminus in |- *; intro; assumption.
intro; generalize (Rsqr_u (mkposreal (eps / (2 * vi * t)) H1) t H); simpl in |- *; replace (2 * (eps / (2 * vi * t)) * vi * t)%R with (eps * 1)%R.
unfold Rdiv in |- *; repeat rewrite Rinv_mult_distr.
replace (2 * (eps * (/ 2 * / vi * / t)) * vi * t)%R with (eps * (2 * / 2) * (/ vi * vi) * (/ t * t))%R.
red in |- *; intro H2; rewrite H2 in H0; elim (Rlt_irrefl 0 H0).
generalize (TypeSpeed_pos vi); intro H2; red in |- *; intro H3; rewrite H3 in H2; elim (Rlt_irrefl 0 H2).
generalize (TypeSpeed_pos vi); intro H2; red in |- *; intro H3; rewrite H3 in H2; elim (Rlt_irrefl 0 H2).
generalize (TypeSpeed_pos vi); intro H2; red in |- *; intro H3; rewrite H3 in H2; elim (Rlt_irrefl 0 H2).
red in |- *; intro H2; rewrite H2 in H0; elim (Rlt_irrefl 0 H0).

rewrite <- H1; unfold u0 in |- *; unfold xP, yP in |- *; unfold Rminus in |- *; repeat rewrite Rplus_opp_r; repeat rewrite Rsqr_0; rewrite Rmult_0_r; repeat rewrite Rplus_0_l; rewrite sqrt_0; rewrite Rsqr_0; left; apply (cond_pos eps).
rewrite Rsqr_mult; apply le_epsilon; intros; generalize (Rsqr_u_Rsqr_vt (mkposreal eps H0) t H); simpl in |- *; unfold u0 in |- *; unfold xP, yP in |- *; intro H1; assumption.
apply sqrt_positivity; apply Rplus_le_le_0_compat; apply Rle_0_sqr.
apply Rmult_le_pos; [ left; apply (TypeSpeed_pos vi) | assumption ].
